author: Laura Smith-Spark, CNN
title: Is an 'immunity certificate' the way to get out of coronavirus lockdown?
description: Perhaps half the world's population is under some form of lockdown to help curb the spread of coronavirus. Many are starting to wonder when and how these tough restrictions on everyday life will end. Could a so-called immunity passport be the answer?
content:
(CNN)Perhaps half the world's population is living under some form of restriction to help curb the spread of coronavirus. Many are starting to wonder when and how these tough limits on everyday activities will end.
